questions.text: Is this person required to sign the sex offenders' register?
questions.name: requiredToSignSexOffenderRegister
questions.failedQuestionDescription: you will be subject to sex offender registration on release

eligibility.taskName: Extended Sentence for violent or sexual offences

questions.text: Is this person serving an extended sentence for violent or sexual offences?
questions.name: servingExtendedSentenceForViolentOrSexualOffence
questions.failedQuestionDescription: you are serving an extended sentence

questions.text: Is this person serving a sentence for ROTL failure to return?
questions.name: rotlFailedToReturn
questions.failedQuestionDescription: you did not return from release on temporary licence (ROTL).

questions.text: Is this person serving a sentence for breaching a community order curfew?
questions.name: communityOrderCurfewBreach
questions.failedQuestionDescription: you breached your community order curfew

questions.text: Has this person been recalled for breaching their HDC curfew within 2 years of their current sentence date
questions.name: recalledForBreachingHdcCurfew
questions.failedQuestionDescription: you previously broke home detention curfew conditions and were recalled to prison

questions.text: Is this person a foreign national who has been recommended for deportation?
questions.name: recommendedForDeportation
questions.failedQuestionDescription: the court recommended you should be deported from the UK

questions.text: Is this person a foreign national who is liable to deportation and been served with a decision to deport?
questions.name: servedADecisionToDeport
questions.failedQuestionDescription: the Home Office recommended you should be deported from the UK

eligibility.taskName: Recalled from early release on compassionate grounds

questions.text: Is this person currently serving a recall from early release on compassionate grounds?
questions.name: recalledFromEarlyReleaseOnCompassionateGrounds
questions.failedQuestionDescription: you were recalled from early release on compassionate grounds

questions.text: Is this person currently serving a sentence for terrorist or terrorist-connected offending?
questions.name: terroristSentenceOrOffending
questions.failedQuestionDescription: you are serving a sentence for a specified terrorist or terrorist connected offence

questions.text: Is this person serving an SDS+, DYOI+, or S250+ sentence subject to two-thirds release criteria?
questions.name: subjectToTwoThirdsReleaseCriteria
questions.failedQuestionDescription: you are serving a sentence subject to two-thirds release criteria (SDS+, DYOI+ or S250+)

questions.text: Would this person be serving an SDS+, DYOI+ or S250+ sentence if they had been sentenced after the Police and Crime Sentencing Act 2022 was introduced?
questions.hint:
This applies if a sentence of:

  • seven years or more was given before April 1 2020 for adults or before June 28 2022 for children for any of the serious sexual or violent offences in parts 1 and 2 of schedule 15
  • between 4 and 7 years was given before 28 June 2022 for any of the serious sexual offences listed in Part 2 of schedule 15 or manslaughter, attempt/conspire/solicit/incite murder, and wounding with intent to do grievous bodily harm
questions.name: retrospectiveTwoThirdsReleaseCriteria
questions.failedQuestionDescription: you are serving a sentence which would have been subject to two-thirds release if you had been sentenced today

questions.text: Has notice under section 244ZB been served that is still in force?
questions.name: served244ZBNoticeInForce
questions.failedQuestionDescription: the Secretary of State has referred your case to the Parole Board under section 244ZB of the Criminal Justice Act 2003

questions.text: Is this person's release governed by schedule 20B of the Criminal Justice Act 2003?
questions.name: schedule20BRelease
questions.failedQuestionDescription: you are subject to the release provisions for long-term prisoners set out in the Criminal Justice Act 1991 (Schedule 20B of the 2003 Act)

questions.text: Does this person have a history of sexual-offending but is not required to sign the sex offender's register?
questions.name: historyOfSexualOffending
questions.failedQuestionDescription: of your conviction history

questions.text: Is this person a foreign national who is liable to deportation but not yet served a decision to deport?
questions.name: liableToDeportation
questions.failedQuestionDescription: you are being considered for deportation

suitability.taskName: Recalled for poor behaviour on hdc

questions.text: Has this person been recalled for poor behaviour on HDC within 2 years of their current HDC date?
questions.name: poorBehaviourOnHdc
questions.failedQuestionDescription: you were recalled to prison for poor behaviour during your previous home detention curfew release

questions.text: Is this person category A?
questions.name: categoryA
questions.failedQuestionDescription: you are a category A prisoner

questions.text: Does this person have a high or very high risk of serious harm?
questions.name: highOrVeryHighRoSH
questions.failedQuestionDescription: you are at high risk of harm and subject to MAPPA level 2 or 3 management

questions.text: Are they MAPPA level 2 or 3?
questions.name: mappaLevel2Or3
questions.failedQuestionDescription: you are at high risk of harm and subject to MAPPA level 2 or 3 management

questions.text: Is this person serving a prison sentence for any of these categories of offence?
questions.hint:
• Homicide
  • Explosives
  • Possession of an offensive weapon
  • Possession of firearms with intent
  • Cruelty to children
  • Racially aggravated offences
  • Stalking, harassment and other offences linked to domestic abuse
  • Terrorist offences not described in section 247A(2) of the Criminal Justice Act 2003
questions.name: presumedUnsuitableOffences
questions.failedQuestionDescription: of the type of offence you were convicted of

questions.text: Does this person have a history of terrorist or terrorist connected offending?
questions.name: terroristOffendingHistory
questions.failedQuestionDescription: of your terrorist or terrorist connected offending history
